draw_map.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ======================
00003 !
00004 !   DRAW_MAP
00005 !
00006 !   Output particles and space-filling curve for postprocessing
00007 !   by GLE 
00008 !
00009 ! ======================
00010 
00011 subroutine draw_map
00012 
00013 
00014   use treevars
00015 
00016   implicit none
00017 
00018   integer*8 :: key_twig(ntwig), key_leaf(nleaf)
00019 
00020   integer, dimension(ntwig) :: level_twig, node_twig, owner_twig       ! twig-nodes
00021   integer, dimension(nleaf) :: level_leaf, plist_leaf, ind_leaf, owner_leaf       ! leaf-nodes
00022 
00023   character(30) :: cfile
00024   character(1) :: csnap
00025   character(3) :: cme
00026   character(7), parameter :: colors(0:9) = (/"orange ", "cyan   ", "magenta", "blue   ", "green  ", &
00027        "red    ","yellow ","grey20 ","violet ","brown  "/) 
00028 
00029 
00030   integer :: i, ip, j, ilev, isnap, ibt, ix, iy, nbits
00031   real :: s, xt, yt
00032 
00033 
00034   csnap=achar(mod(me,10)+48)
00035 
00036 
00037   !  Header file written out by root PE: does box and includes particle O/P from all PEs
00038   if ( me==0 ) then
00039      cfile="tree2d.gle"
00040      write (ipefile,'(a)') cfile
00041      open(60,file=cfile)
00042 
00043      !  initialise graphics filter
00044 
00045      write (60,'(a,3(/a),2(/a,2f13.4))') &
00046           'size 18 18' &
00047           , 'set font rm' &
00048           , 'set lwidth 0.05 lstyle 1' &
00049           , 'psize=0.04' &
00050           , 'begin scale ',15./boxsize,15./boxsize &
00051           , 'begin translate ',.01*boxsize,.01*yl
00052 
00053      write (60,'(a/a,2f13.4)') 'amove 0 0','box ',boxsize,yl
00054 
00055      do i=0, num_pe-1
00056         cme = achar(i/100+48) // achar(i/10+48) // achar(mod(i,10)+48)  ! Convert 3-digit PE number into character string
00057         cfile="tree_"//cme//".gle"
00058         write (60,'(2a)') 'include ',cfile
00059      end do
00060      write (60,'(a/a)') 'end translate','end scale'
00061      close(60)
00062 
00063   endif
00064 
00065 
00066   !  Now do particles and boxes belonging to each processor domain
00067 
00068   cme = achar(me/100+48) // achar(me/10+48) // achar(mod(me,10)+48)  ! Convert 3-digit PE number into character string
00069   cfile="tree_"//cme//".gle"
00070   open (60,file=cfile) 
00071 
00072 
00073   do i=1,npp
00074      write (60,'(a,a)') 'set color ',colors( mod(me,8) )
00075 
00076      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',x(i),y(i)
00077      write (60,'(2a)') 'circle psize fill ',colors( mod(me,8))
00078 !     write (60,'(2a)') 'circle psize fill ','black'
00079   end do
00080 
00081 
00082   ! map of interleaved bits 
00083 
00084   ilev = nlev
00085   s = boxsize/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00086   ! recover box coordinates of parents
00087   ibt = nlev-ilev           ! bit shift factor (0=particle node, nlev-1 = root)
00088   do j = 1,npp
00089      ix = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( ishft( pekey(j),-2*ibt ),2*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-2-ibt) /) )
00090      iy = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( ishft( pekey(j),-2*ibt ),2*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-2-ibt) /) )
00091   end do
00092 
00093 
00094   ! first point
00095   xt=x(1)
00096   yt=y(1)
00097   write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00098   write (60,'(a,a)') 'set color ',colors( mod(me,8) )
00099   write (60,'(a,a)') 'set lwidth 0.03'
00100 
00101   do ip = 2,npp
00102      xt=x(ip)
00103      yt=y(ip)
00104      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'aline ',xt,yt
00105   end do
00106 
00107   !  boundary links
00108   if (me /= lastpe) then
00109           write (60,'(a)') 'set lstyle 2'
00110           write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'aline ',x(npp+1),y(npp+1)
00111   endif
00112 
00113 
00114 
00115   close(60)
00116 
00117 end subroutine draw_map
